name: Sympathy - A Puzzle Game about Links
name_original: Sympathy - A Puzzle Game about Links
description:
Sympathy is a puzzle game about making links and manipulating energy for Wednesdevs #1 with the theme Linked.

It's inspired by The Kingkiller Chronicles' magic system, in which properties of objects are manipulated through sympathetic links. I stuck to using only the Undelete Button-Diversifier.

Arrow Keys – Move cursor and select properties
X – Establish links or move an object
Y/Z – Restart a level
